comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: South-east corner of Avenida Balderas and calle Artículo 123. If you zoom in to maximum resolution in digitalcollections.smu.edu/cdm/ref/collection/mex/id/132 you'll see in the corner the street plate that reads 4a. Calle de Nuevo Mexico, 4th New Mexico Street (today Artículo 123 Street), Mexico City. This is the corner across the street to that seen in digitalcollections.smu.edu/cdm/singleitem/collection/mex/... and opposite to that seen in digitalcollections.smu.edu/cdm/singleitem/collection/mex/...
